TITLE: Login with valid credentials
STEPS: 1) Enter username: standard_user 2) Enter password: secret_sauce 3) Click Login
EXPECTED: User is redirected to Products page (https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html) and product list is displayed

TITLE: Login with invalid password
STEPS: 1) Enter username: standard_user 2) Enter password: wrong_password 3) Click Login
EXPECTED: Error message is displayed and user remains on login page

TITLE: Login with empty fields
STEPS: 1) Leave username empty 2) Leave password empty 3) Click Login

TITLE: Logout from system
EXPECTED: User is redirected to login page

TITLE: Open product details
PRECONDITIONS: User is logged in on Products page
STEPS: 1) Click a product name or image
EXPECTED: Product details page opens and product information is displayed

TITLE: Add item to cart
PRECONDITIONS: User is logged in on Products page
STEPS: 1) Click 'Add to cart' on any product 2) Open Cart
EXPECTED: Cart badge updates and the item appears in cart

TITLE: Remove item from cart
PRECONDITIONS: At least one item is in cart
STEPS: 1) Open Cart 2) Click 'Remove' on the item
EXPECTED: Item is removed from cart and cart badge updates

TITLE: Start checkout
PRECONDITIONS: At least one item is in cart

TITLE: Checkout missing First Name
PRECONDITIONS: User is on checkout information page
STEPS: 1) Leave First Name empty 2) Fill Last Name and Zip 3) Click Continue
EXPECTED: Error message is displayed and user remains on checkout information page

TITLE: Complete checkout successfully
PRECONDITIONS: User is on checkout information page with at least one item in cart
STEPS: 1) Fill First Name, Last Name, Zip 2) Click Continue 3) Click Finish
EXPECTED: Order completion page is displayed and confirmation message appears
